name: Points Tennis
description:
Points Tennis

Points Tennis is a mobile phone game which uses touchscreen.

Minimum display resolution required is 1280 x 720.

Points Tennis is a nice and fun tennis game.

Touch the area behind your player to serve. The position of the touch will determine the angle of the serve. Touch longer to get more power for the shot. The touch should be less then one second. If the touch is more then one second then touch the left side of the court to resume serve. Your player serves from one side only.

Touch to move your player. Touch longer to get more power for the shot. Remember that the touch should be less then one second. If the touch is longer than one second your player will stop. When your player is moving touch to stop the player. The touch on the screen should be below the baseline.

Play forehands and backhands in Points Tennis. The time of your touch also changes the angle of your forehands and backhands when you touch to move your player. Ten points wins the game.
